Phone Numbers

Please, choose action.

Id Category Name
{{ phoneNumber.phoneId }} {{ phoneNumber.numberPhone }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PhoneNumberDataService, PhoneNumber } from './phoneNumbersdata.service'; @Component({ selector: 'phoneNumbers', templateUrl: './phoneNumbers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./phoneNumbers.component.css'] }) export class PhoneNumbersComponent implements OnInit { public phoneNumbers: PhoneNumber[] | undefined; constructor(private phoneNumberDataSrv: PhoneNumberDataService) { } ngOnInit() { this.phoneNumbers = this.phoneNumberDataSrv.phoneNumbers; this.showAll(); } showAll() { this.phoneNumberDataSrv.showAll(); } //showFromCA() { // this.phoneNumberDataSrv.showFromCA(); //} addPhoneNumber() { this.phoneNumberDataSrv.addPhoneNumber(); } updatePhoneNumber() { this.phoneNumberDataSrv.updatePhoneNumber(); } deletePhoneNumber() { this.phoneNumberDataSrv.deletePhoneNumber(); } }
